pages.text: Once imbued, your jewelry can contain magic. $(l)Imbued jewelry holds one augment. Choose wisely!$()$(br2)To choose another augment, you may remove the current ability in a $(#490)Grindstone$() or a $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/disenchanting_table)Disenchanting Table$()$(br2)Imbued Jewelry adds a passive beneficial attribute based on the specific crafting ingredient used. Imbued wards can be used as shields.
